sentences.en: "Tired and emotional" is a code word for being drunk.
sentences.cn: “又累又激动”是形容人喝醉酒的一种委婉说法。

sentences.en: All members of the association adhere to a strict code of practice.
sentences.cn: 协会的所有成员都遵守一套严格的行为规范。

sentences.en: All reports must be sent in code.
sentences.cn: 所有报告均须用密码发送。

sentences.en: Brian keyed in his personal code.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩键入了他的个人密码。

sentences.en: But we have not yet implemented this in the code.
sentences.cn: 但我们在代码中尚未实现此功能。

sentences.en: Each path is coded to show the level of difficulty.
sentences.cn: 每条路线都按难度编了号。

sentences.en: Each state in the US has a different criminal and civil code.
sentences.cn: 美国的每个州都有不同的刑事和民事法规。

sentences.en: In showing contempt for the heavyweight championship Douglas offended a stern code.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯藐视重量级拳王称号的行为违背了严格的准则。

sentences.en: One of their informers was working under the code name Czerny.
sentences.cn: 他们的一名线人用车尔尼作化名。

sentences.en: Pictures of road signs are matched with their Highway Code meanings.
sentences.cn: 道路标志图是同公用通道法规一致的。

sentences.en: The analogue signals from the video tape are converted into digital code.
sentences.cn: 采自该录像带的模拟信号被转换成数字代码。

sentences.en: The area code for western Pennsyl-vania is 412.
sentences.cn: 宾夕法尼亚西部的电话区号是412。

sentences.en: The company has a strict dress code—all male employees are expected to wear suits.
sentences.cn: 公司有严格的着装规定—所有男职员都要穿西服。

sentences.en: The hacker came smack up against the company's policy of keeping its records in code.
sentences.cn: 这个计算机黑客突然碰壁了，因这家公司实行了用密码保存公司纪录的政策。

sentences.en: The judge ruled that there had been no breach of the code .
sentences.cn: 法官裁定没有违犯法规。

sentences.en: The new code of conduct lays down the ground rules for management-union relations.
sentences.cn: 新的行为规范确定了资方与工会关系的基本原则。

sentences.en: The newspaper breached the code of conduct on privacy.
sentences.cn: 该报违反了保护隐私的行为准则。

sentences.en: The operation was code-named Moonlight Sonata.
sentences.cn: 这次行动的代号是“月光奏鸣曲”。

sentences.en: The operation was given the code name Dynamo.
sentences.cn: 这次行动的代号为“发电机”。

sentences.en: The spy sent his message in code.
sentences.cn: 这个间谍用密码发送情报。

sentences.en: The Torah is the basis for all the Jewish laws and their moral code .
sentences.cn: 《托拉》是所有犹太法律和道德规范的基础。

sentences.en: The Torah is the basis for all the Jewish laws and their moral code.
sentences.cn: 《托拉》是所有犹太法律和道德规范的基础。

sentences.en: There is a strict dress code: no trainers or jeans.
sentences.cn: 有严格的着装规定：不许穿运动鞋和牛仔裤。

sentences.en: There were plans to introduce a dress code (= rules about what to wear ) for civil servants.
sentences.cn: 有计划要推行公务员衣着规定。

sentences.en: They didn’t realise that we’d broken their secret code.
sentences.cn: 他们没有意识到我们已经破译了他们的密码。

sentences.en: They used elaborate secret codes, as when the names of trees stood for letters.
sentences.cn: 他们用的是精心设计的密码，用树木的名称代表字母。

sentences.en: to decipher a code
sentences.cn: 破译密码

words.tran_cn: 编纂，整理；法典编纂；法律汇编
编纂；将...编成法典；编成法典

phrases.tran_cn: (北美)按最新的建筑规章修葺旧建筑（或更新其设施）
道德规范（尤指职业的）；道德准则

trans.tran_cn: 法规，行为准则，密码，代码，编码，信号
trans.tran_en: a system of words, letters, or symbols that you use instead of ordinary writing, so that the information can only be understood by someone else who knows the system
to put a set of numbers, letters, or symbols on something to show what it is or give information about it
to put a set of numbers, letters, or symbols on something to show what it is or give information about it
